headline: How The Abbott Offer Is Rewriting The Story For Exact Sciences (EXAS)
summary: Exact Sciences’ story has shifted toward the US$105 per share Abbott offer becoming the key anchor for what many investors watch as a reference value, and that is now reflected in a fair value estimate that holds steady at US$105.81 per share. Behind that headline number, the discount rate has nudged slightly lower from 7.25% to 7.24% and revenue growth assumptions have moved from 12.30% to 11.03%, as analysts increasingly frame their models around the agreed deal price rather than longer...
